title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.


### OS

_No response_

- **LLM Provider 추상화**: Gemini 외 Groq/Ollama 지원을 위한 Provider Pattern 구현

# Ground Truth Validation System for IITM BS Chatbot

## Overview

This PR implements a comprehensive ground truth validation system to achieve 99%+ accuracy for the IITM BS degree programme chatbot. The work progressed through three distinct phases: initial hallucination prevention, performance

title: [PR] feat: fix the AI service to remove the discrimination union
summary:
## Summary

Refactored the AI response schema from a discriminated union to a flat object structure to fix compatibility issues with AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic). This resolves validation errors where providers rejected `oneOf`/`anyOf` schemas in tool calling mode. Additionally, updated the Op
